Reviews.Title: “Good place to start a city tour and to return to find rest and energy for the next day”
Reviews.Author: Spinring10
Reviews.Content: central location town reach public transport cheap clean ac wireless internet television terrace view sea breakfast reception 24hours ie postcards shop restaurants close hotel stayed 3 nights recommend

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, average hotel, rude staff”

Reviews.Content: location hotel convenient walkable distance mosques tourist spots staff hotel rude racist discourteous absolutely impolite didnt customers treated respect convenience dont recommend hotel
